timeline.message:
fix(exporters): don't print confidential information

 The authentication is no longer printed on startup

timeline.bodyText: I would propose to still override toString and keep it blank or something, with a comment that we should not implement it. That way it's less likely that we later add it accidentally. WDYT?
timeline.author: menski

timeline.message:
fix(broker): donot print confidential informantion

 The exporter password and username is replaced with stars to not expose
 them when printing the json on broker bootstrap.

chore(elastic): overwrite toString

 Add comment that we dont want to print confidential information
